title: Lasagne for cheese lovers
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons olive oil', '2 red onions, minced', '3 cloves of garlic, minced', '500g pork, beef or lamb mince', '1/2 bottle (375ml) red wine', '1 large heaped tablespoon oregano', 'pepper', '4 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '3 (250g) packets ricotta cheese', 'salt', 'grated Parmesan', '1 egg', '250g fresh mozzarella balls or bagged grated mozzarella', '500g lasagne sheets', '1 tablespoon chilli flakes (optional)']
